Indonesia-DPRK Friendship Association formed
articles.content:
Indonesia-DPRK Friendship Association formed 
     Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the building of the Sukarno Educational Foundation on April 3 to inaugurate the Indonesia-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Interchange Association.
   At the meeting, president of the foundation Rahmawati Sukarnoptri declared the inauguration of the association and announced the list of members of the association leadership.    
   A letter to the great leader Kim Jong Il was adopted there.

articles.title: Foreign and overseas Korean artistes arrive
articles.content:
Foreign and overseas Korean artistes arrive 
     Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign and overseas Korean art troupes and artistes arrived here to participate in the 18th April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
   Among them were a Chinese art troupe, a Chinese acrobatic troupe, a naval song and dance ensemble of the Russian Ministry of Defence, a Russian Moscow State Academic Philharmony, a Russian circus, a Nepalese art troupe, a Malaysian art troupe, a Mongolian art troupe, a Mongolian acrobatic troupe, Singaporean art troupe, an art troupe of the new cultural committee of Indonesia, an Indian Bharat Natyam Dance Troupe, a Tenko magician group of Japan, Vietnamese art troupe and group of acrobats, a German cello ensemble, a Romanian art troupe, a Belarussian bliskavitsa song and dance troupe, a Belarussian musical troupe, a Swiss musical troupe, a French art troupe, a Cuban musical troupe and acrobat, a Tajik art troupe, an Armenian musical troupe, an Uzbek musical troupe, an Italian art troupe, an Egyptian folk dance troupe, a Swedish acrobatic troupe, an art troupe of Japan-Korea Art Exchange Society, a group of Colombian artistes, Cambodian musician and acrobat, group of Moldovan musicians, Bulgarian groups of    musicians and acrobats, a Polish group of musicians, an Austrian group of musicians, an Ukrainian group of musicians, a group of Yugoslav soloist, an art troupe of Koreans in Japan, an art troupe of Koreans in China and an art troupe of Koreans in the United States.    
   Meanwhile, Chinese, Russian and Mongolian delegations, a delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans, a delegation of Koreans in China, an Uzbek delegate and a delegate of Koreans in Japan arrived to participate in the 3rd aesthetic symposium on the present times and national art.

articles.title: Foreigners arrive to attend IIJI meeting
articles.content:
Foreigners arrive to attend IIJI meeting 
      Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Horst Michael Junghas, chairman of the Sachsen provincial association for the study of the Juche idea in Germany, and his party and Kurt Ebert, director of the state political institute of Austria, arrived here on Sunday by air to attend the 15th meeting of the board of directors of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
   Earlier, an Italian delegate for the study of the Juche idea, Guiseppe Amata arrived.

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il receives gift from Indonesian delegation 
    Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the visiting Indonesian government cultural delegation.
   Head of the delegation Hidajat Djaelani, state minister of tourism and arts of Indonesia, today conveyed the gift to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
